title: Tournament Team
body:
Hello, my name is Max. 

Currenly im searching for a Team to play tournaments and so on. I want to play this game more competetiv than just going for solo q and clap kids. 
Im Gold 1 atm and main adc. Im from germany but im able to speak english aswell. Also im not toxic and tilt proof. 

My ingame name is PIIerIto (3x big i )

replies.body: Deutsches Forum schreib auch deutsch, aufm englischen kanns de ruhig Englisch schreiben.
what do u mean? Its an english forum
